metadata.name: Obfuscated PowerShell OneLiner Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a specific OneLiner to download and execute powershell modules in memory.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\powershell.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http://127.0.0.1')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%{(irm $_)}')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.substring.tostring()[67,72,64]-join')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('import-module')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a specific OneLiner to download and execute powershell modules in memory.
